data.message: My husband wants my cell phone # on his account, as he is not computer/cell phone literate.  By putting my phone # on his account, you removed my cell phone # from my account.  How can I have my cell phone # on both accounts for security purposes?

replies.message: Hey Betty. Because your phone number is used to uniquely identify your account, you won't be able to use the same phone number to verify multiple accounts. Learn more: http://bit.ly/1rVwLk0. -Jordan
Facebook Thanks!  Maybe that is something that can be looked into in the future.  I can't believe that my husband is the only person not comfortable with technology.
